headline.main: RED ARMY WAVERS; 150 German Tanks Force New Russian Retreat on Southwest BUT NORTHERN LINES HOLD Berlin Reports Volga Reached Above City and Claims Gain in Novorossiisk Drive RED ARMY WAVERS BEFORE VOLGA CITY

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Thursday, Sept. 3 -- The threat to Stalingrad became even more acute yesterday. Striving with all his might to reach the city, General Field Marshal Fedor von Bock intensified his attack from the southwest, flinging 150 tanks into the narrow salient that was driven into the Russian lines on Monday.
abstract: Gers claim Volga River reached and Novorossiisk drive gain
